source_sentence: 大輪金剛修行悉地成就及供養
translation: accomplishment of the practice of the great wheel vajra and making offerings to it

source_sentence: 法
translation: dharma

source_sentence: 我依金剛頂經略述大輪持念次第。
translation: I'll briefly describe the sequence of mindfulness of the great wheel according to the Vajraśekhara-sūtra.

source_sentence: 先當持一淨室。
translation: First, you should maintain a clean room.

source_sentence: 嚴飾道場起曼荼羅。
translation: You'll adorn the site of enlightenment and erect a maṇḍala.

source_sentence: 華幡幢蓋燒香散華。
translation: Flowers, banners, banners, and shrouds will be burned, and incense will be scattered.

source_sentence: 先應從師得受灌頂竟。
translation: First, you should receive the consecration from your teacher.

source_sentence: 然後親受持念教法乃可修習。
translation: Then, you should personally receive the recitation teaching before cultivating it.

source_sentence: 每日三時時別一千八十遍。
translation: Each day, he should do 1,800 distinct recitations at three times.

source_sentence: 更不移易遍數滿三洛叉即獲成就。
translation: Without changing the number of iterations, he'll attain success when he completes three lokas.

source_sentence: 每欲入道場時。
translation: Whenever he wants to enter the site of enlightenment, he first thinks the Sanskrit letter un in his mind.

source_sentence: 先心中想吽字。
translation: First, he thinks of the Sanskrit character un in his mind.

source_sentence: 觀字化一大金剛。
translation: He transforms the word into a large vajra.

source_sentence: 便去入道場中至本尊前。
translation: He then goes into the meditation hall and goes to the head honored one.

source_sentence: 端身正立合掌至心懺悔思惟。
translation: He stands correctly with his body upright and joins his palms in repentance, sincerely contemplating.

source_sentence: 從無始已來。
translation: 'Since beginningless time.

source_sentence: 流轉生死不悟真理常處三界。
translation: I've been in the three realms since beginningless time, transmigrating through birth and death without realizing the truth.

source_sentence: 我今懺悔所有罪障並願消滅。
translation: Now, I want to repent of all the sins and hindrances and wish to extinguish them.

source_sentence: 即念懺悔除罪真言曰。
translation: He then recites the true words of repentance and removal of sins.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩嚩(轉舌呼)幡(引)跛尾(入)娑普(二合)吒娜賀娜嚩日囉(二合)野(引)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)由誦此真言加持力故。
translation: "Om (citation) sarva (turn of the tongue) banner (citation) sapu (binary) za na he na vajra (binary) nao (citation) sarva (binary) he (citation) because of the empowering power of reciting this true saying.

source_sentence: 獲得三業清淨三昧。
translation: He attains the samādhi of purifying the three activities.

source_sentence: 次當頂上合掌。
translation: Next, he should place his palms together at the top of his head.

source_sentence: 誦普禮一切佛及聖眾真言。
translation: He recites the true saying, "Universally worship all the buddhas and holy people.

source_sentence: 曰。
translation: He says.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩嚩怛他(引)蘗哆迦(引)翼嚩(二合)訖唧(二合)哆跛娜曩迦(引)嚕弭　南無十方等正覺　　三世一切具三身　南無一切大乘法　　南無不退菩薩眾　南無諸明真實言　　南無一切諸密印　唯願慈悲護念我　　拔我出於生死泥　我之肉眼不見知　　道眼普見我歸命歸命真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) svātathā (citation needed) śataka (citation needed) yikṣu (citation needed) kṛkṣu (dichotomy) tālêndra nāga (citation needed) rūmi. Namo ten directions of perfect awakening, all three worlds and all three bodies, all great vehicle teachings, the nonretrogressing bodhisattva congregation, all true and real words of knowledge, and all mysterious signs. May kindness and compassion protect me and lift me out of the mire of birth and death. My physical eyes don't see and know, and the path's eyes see me universally.

source_sentence: 曩謨(引)禰捨南(二合)沒陀俱胝南(上)唵(引)戶盧戶盧悉馱路佐儞薩縛囉他(二合)娑馱儞娑嚩(二合)賀　我從過去世　　流轉生死中　恣身口意業　　及嫉妬慳悋　邪見覆心故　　違越三昧耶　今對大聖尊　　盡心而懺悔　如先佛所懺　　我今亦如是　願乘加持力　　眾生悉清淨　二羽虛心合　　想身如琉璃　內外極明徹　　以三密金剛　加持成本尊　　次以淨三業　印轉於五處　　成清淨澡浴真言曰。
translation: "Since my past lives, when I wandered through birth and death, I've been unrestrained in my physical, verbal, and mental actions, jealousy, stinginess, and stinginess, and because my mind is hindered by wrong views, I've turned my back on the great sage honored one, repented with all my heart, just as the previous buddhas had repented, and now I also wish to ride on the power of the blessing and have all sentient beings be purified, imagining my body as beryl with the inner and outermost clarity, using the three mysterious vajras to uphold this honored one, followed by purifying the three actions, turning the seals in five places, and creating a pure bath.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩嚩(二合)婆嚩秫(詩律反)馱(一切法清淨)薩嚩達麼(上)娑嚩(二合)婆嚩秫度憾　金剛掌置頂　　運心遍法界　親對十方佛　　菩薩金剛眾　捨身委地禮　我淨此身離諸垢　　及與三世身口意　過於大海剎塵數　　奉獻一切諸如來密言曰。
translation: "Om (ring) sarva (bla) bla pan (shilu) dhada (supreme) sarva (bla) bla pan (bla) bla pandundu regent, placing his vajra palms on his head and carrying his mind throughout the Dharma realm, personally facing the buddhas of the ten directions, the bodhisattva Vajras, abandoning himself to the ground, I purify this body, free it from all defilements, and with the bodies, mouths, and minds of the three worlds, I transcend the great ocean, the number of dust in the balsas, and offer it to all the tathāgatas," he said in a mantra.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩嚩怛他蘗哆布惹鉢羅(二合)嚩(轉舌)哆曩夜阿答麼南涅哩(二合)野多夜弭薩嚩怛他蘗多室者地底瑟姹(二合)曩薩嚩怛他蘗多若難謎阿味設都　端坐澄身心　　政念觀本尊　先結三昧耶　　定慧虛心合　進力附忍願　　押背初節文　禪智附進力　　各捻下節文　諦觀諸如來　　相好見分明佛部三昧耶真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) sarva-tantra-paṇḍalā-puja-paripṛcchā(ii) sarva-tantra-paṇḍalā-nannieri(ii) nayetāya-sarva-tantra-paṇḍalā-śratiṣṭhita(ii) an sarva-tantra-paṇḍalā-jñānastiṣṭhita-saṃkusumitâbhijña sit upright, clarify body and mind, and observe the original honored one with mindfulness. First, he conjures up a samaya, combines meditation and wisdom with calmness of mind, applies effort, and vows to patience, backs the first verse, applies meditation and wisdom with effort, and twists the second verse each, and observes the tathāgatas with their distinctive features, and then he reveals the Buddha's samaya, which goes.

source_sentence: 唵(引)怛他(引)蘗都納婆(二合)嚩(引)野(引)娑嚩(二合)賀　七遍頂上散　　由此能警覺　諸佛來護念　　得身業清淨　次陳蓮華部　　如前二羽合　散舒餘六度　　微屈八葉蓮　密想觀自在　　相好極端嚴　并無量俱胝　　蓮華族聖眾　圍遶其加持　　獲得語業淨真言曰。
translation: "Om (cited) tathā (cited) śanta (cited) śanta (cited) va (cited) sāvar (cited) he seven times scatters from the top of the head, thus alerting the mind to the protection of the buddhas and attaining purification of physical actions. Next, he explains the lotus school as in the previous two combinations, scattering and stretching the other six degrees, delicately bending the eight-leaf lotus, observing the self-perfection of contemplation, with its extremely dignified appearance and measureless multitude of lotus sages surrounding it and upholding it, and obtaining the purification of verbal actions," he says.

source_sentence: 唵(引)跛娜麼(二合)納婆(二合)嚩野娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　金剛三昧耶　　左覆仰右羽　令指背相著　　檀智并禪慧　各各反相叉　　餘如三股杵　當想金剛藏　　忿怒光赫奕　應察金剛族　　眷屬自圍繞　由此加持故　　獲意業清淨真言曰。
translation: "Om (cited) Ṛl_nama (btn) nava (btn) vasano (btn) svāh (btn) he (cited) vajrasamaya, covering his left side, raising his right side, making his fingers stick together, placing his fingers on the back, inverting his fingers with his wisdom, and folding each other's arms like a three-pronged pounder. He should contemplate the vajra store, its wrathful radiance shining brightly, and the vajra clan should be observed, surrounded by their followers, and because of this support, he obtains the true saying for the purification of mental activity.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日嚧(二合)納婆(二合)嚩野娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　次當被甲冑　　福智內相叉　忍願竪相合　　進力屈如鉤　禪智押戒方　　印五處成甲　遍緣諸有情　　速令離障難　諸魔及惡人　　無能得其便真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajrarut (btn) Nava (btn) Vano (btn) Vaas (btn) He (citation) will then be armored, forking his fortune and wisdom internally, bending his vows and vows together, bending his strength like a hook, binding his meditation and wisdom to the direction of the precepts, and sealing the five places into armor that will universally refer to sentient beings and quickly free them from hindrances and difficulties, so that demons and bad people won't be able to get an advantage over them.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)儗儞(二合)鉢羅(二合)捻波跢(二合)野娑嚩(二合)賀　次結地界印　　以戒忍二度　置於願方間　　各繳入掌中　檀慧進力度　　禪智各相合　相如金剛杵　　禪智按於地　印明加持故　　下至金剛輪　即成堅固界　　金剛不壞座　天魔不能動　　穢惡成清淨真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajra (btn) Śubhāra (btn) Śubhāra (btn) Śubhāra (btn) Śubhāra (btn) Next, he sets the seal for the earth realm. He places the two virtues of forbearance and morality between the vows, puts each in his palm, advances the strength of his wisdom, and combines his meditation and wisdom with each other like a vajra pounder, presses his meditation and wisdom to the ground, and because of the seal's insight and support, he descends to the vajra wheel and creates a solid realm, the vajra's indestructible seat, which the demons can't move and which defiles evil and makes it pure.

source_sentence: 唵(引)枳里枳里嚩日羅部律(二合)滿馱滿馱吽發吒(半音)　次結金剛牆　　準前地界印　開掌竪禪智　　從印流熾焰　右旋遶三匝　　即成堅固界真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) hṛgali hṛgali vajra-bhūmi-prāgbhūta-undharma-faṭa (half-sound), then form the vajra wall, following the preceding seal of the earth realm, open your palms and raise your meditation wisdom. From the seal, stream the blazing fire, spin it to the right and circle it three times, and the firm realm is formed.

source_sentence: 唵(引)薩囉薩囉嚩日羅(二合)鉢羅(二合)賀羅吽泮吒　次結纔發意　　轉法輪密印　各作金剛拳　　進力檀慧鉤　以此加持故　　身器成清淨　成法曼荼羅　　以印觸壇上　即成金剛部　　調伏曼荼羅　印觸本尊像　　及置虛空中　皆成曼荼羅　　行者設越法　誤破三昧耶　　真言加持力　戒品淨圓滿真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation needed) sarasrara vajra (btn) pala (btn) hrāva (btn) unpañca Next, he sets the mudrās for the turning of the wheel of the Dharma, and each makes a vajra fist, advances the hook of strength, sandalwood, and wisdom Because of this support, his body becomes pure, and the Dharma maṇḍala is formed. When he touches the seal on the altar, the vajra maṇḍala is formed, and when the seal touches the image of the Bhagavān and places it in the sky, the maṇḍala is formed, and the practitioner sets out to surpass the Dharma and mistakenly refutes the concentration, the empowering power of the true words, and the precepts are purified and completed.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)斫訖羅(二合)吽(引)若(入)吽鑁斛(引)　次結虛空藏　　廣大供養印　當合定慧手　　忍願外相叉　進力麼抳寶　　印流諸供養　衣服飲食雲　　宮殿樓閣等　及香華音樂　　種種寶幢幡　雲海遍十方　　真實成供養　一如極樂界　　壇中地哩力(二合成)字　放於大光明　　如紅頗梨色　遍照十方剎　　遇斯光明者　業障盡消除　　以我功德力　如來加持力　　及以法界力　普供養而住真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajra (binary) Cakravāḍa (binary) Un (citation) Jo (enter) Un Khandel (citation) Next, he sets the seal of the Ākāśagarbha, the seal of vast offerings, which should combine the hands of concentration and wisdom, the external forks of patience and vows, the advancing power of the mañjū treasure, the flow of seal offerings, clothing, food, clouds, palaces, mansions, etc., and incense, flowers, and music. A sea of clouds, banners, and banners that pervade the ten directions truly create offerings. One is like the paradise realm, and the word Dili (binary) on the altar emits a great radiance the color of red pāri, which thoroughly illuminates the buddhas in the ten directions.

source_sentence: 唵(引)誐誐曩參婆嚩嚩日羅(二合)斛(引)　次結車輅印　　二羽仰相叉　各以禪智度　　捻進力下節　七寶車輅成　　往彼金剛宮　請尊及眷屬　　乘此寶車輅送車輅真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) gaṅga-anāsambhava-vajñālapatroṣṇa (citation), then set the seal for the chariot, using meditation and wisdom to save each one, twist the power of advancement downward, and complete the seven-jeweled chariot, sending the honored one and his retinue to the adamantine palace in this precious chariot, true teaching.

source_sentence: 唵(引)都(引)嚕都嚕吽(引)
translation: "Om (citation) tudu (citation) tuduulu (citation) un (citation).

source_sentence: 不散前印相　　當以禪智度
translation: not distracted by the marks of the prior meditation, will be liberated by meditative wisdom

source_sentence: 向身撥進力　　便成請車輅
translation: when one applies the power of advancement to the body, the chariot is invited.

source_sentence: 真言曰。
translation: The verbal formula says.

source_sentence: 曩莫悉底哩也(四合)地尾(二合)迦南怛他蘗哆喃(引)唵(引)嚩日朗儗孃(上)阿迦羅灑(二合)野(若送時除阿迦羅灑野加以尾蘖野)娑嚩(二合)賀　車輅住虛空　　當迎諸聖眾　福智內縛拳　　智度如鉤形　向身三請召　　本尊并眷屬　不捨於本誓　　赴請降道場真言曰。
translation: "In the past, Siddhârtha's Dīrghârtha's Kannanta's Ketu (cited), Om (cited) Vajrarāṭṭṭhaka (above), Aghārasa (above), (except for Aghārasa's Ketu (above), if he sends it off,) Sāgara (dichotomy), and He (dichotomy), a chariot that sits in the sky, will welcome all the sages, blessings, wisdom, inner fists, wisdom, and dominion like a hook, and will summon the venerable and his retinue to the site of the path without abandoning his original vow.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)地叻(二合)摩賀(引)作訖囉(二合)嚩日[口*(隸-木+士)](二合)曀呬曳(二合)呬娑嚩(二合)賀　次結降三世　　忿怒金剛印　二手金剛拳　　檀慧反相鉤(右押左)　進力當心竪　　心想成本尊　右足踏大天　　左踏烏魔妃　遍身燃猛焰　　印心額喉頂　左旋成辟除　　右轉堅營界　四面皆忿怒　　八臂執器杖　立如丁字勢　　入此三摩地　應住菩提心　　深起於悲愍　滅除內外障真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajra (btn) Dilat (btn) Mahā (citation) Saṃkara (btn) Vajra (btn) [mouth*(l-wood+s)] (btn) Obhay (btn) Frey (btn) Frey Saṃkara (btn) Mahā (btn) The next formation is the subduing of the three worlds, the wrathful vajra seal, the two-handed vajra fist, the counter-hook of sandalwood, and the left-handed hook of right-handed wisdom.

source_sentence: 唵(引)遜婆(去)[寧*頁]遜婆(去)[寧*頁]吽(短呼下同)疙哩(二合)釁拏(二合)疙哩(二合)釁拏吽(準上)疙哩(二合)釁拏(二合)跛野吽阿曩野斛(引)婆誐鑁嚩日囉(二合)吽發吒(半音)　上方金剛網　　即前地界印　禪智捻進力(下文)　　頂上三旋遶　金剛堅固網真言曰。
translation: Om (citation) Śumbhâ (depart) [Ning*Page] Śumbhâ (depart) [Ning*Page] Un (short form, same below) 疙里(二合)釁拏(二合)疙里(二合)釁拏吽(准上)疙里(二合)釁拏(二合)跛野吽Anonuo 斛(citation) 婆婆婆ヶ婆日囉(二合)吽發吒(半音) 上方金剛網 就是前地界印 禪智捻進力(下) 上三旋圈圍 金剛牢固網真言曰曰。

source_sentence: 唵(引)尾娑普(二合)囉捺羅(二合)乞叉(二合)嚩日囉(二合)半惹(日羅反)囉吽(引)吽(引)泮吒　金剛火院界　　左掩右羽背　搩竪禪智度　　想火焰熾盛　從印流光明　　右旋於牆外　三重火焰圍　　諸佛菩薩眾　猶尚不違越　　何況諸天魔　而能嬈近者真言曰。
translation: 唵(引)尾娑普(二合)囉捺羅(二合)乞叉(二合)嚩日囉(二合)半惹(日羅反)囉吽(引)吽(引)泮吒　金剛火院界　　左掩右羽背　搩竪禪智度　　想火焰熾盛　從印流光明　　右旋於牆外　三重火焰圍　　諸佛菩薩眾　猶尚不違越　　何況諸天魔　而能嬈近者真言曰。

source_sentence: 唵(引)阿三(去)莽(去)儗寧賀(引)羅吽(引)發吒　次獻閼伽印　　想浴聖眾足　當令修行者　　獲得三業淨真言曰。
translation: "Om (cited) āsan (go) mang (go) kiṃninha (cited) la un (cited) faṭṭa. Next, he offers the sign of guardianship. He wants to bathe the feet of the sages. He will cause those who practice it to obtain purification of the three activities.

source_sentence: 曩謨三滿多沒馱(上)喃誐誐曩三(去)麼(上)糝麼娑嚩(二合)賀　復獻蓮華座　　合掌舒戒方　及忍願進力　　圓如八葉蓮　想從印流出　　無量金剛華　奉獻諸聖尊真言曰。
translation: "In addition, he offers the lotus seat, puts his palms together, shuffles his precepts, and makes a vow of forbearance, perfectly resembling the eight-leaf lotus. The conception flows from the seal, and the adamantine flowers are immeasurable.

source_sentence: 唵(引)
translation: "Om (citation).

source_sentence: 廣大不空王　　摩抳供養印
translation: Vast Amoghavajra, the King of Offerings to the Mohavajra

source_sentence: 當合金剛掌　　進力蹙如寶
translation: Dongdao gongan palm zealous for power and frowning like a jewel

source_sentence: 纔誦祕密明　　遍於十方界
translation: by reciting the mysterious and adroitly explained teachings, the ten directions are covered.

source_sentence: 普雨大供養　　塗香華鬘雲
translation: pervasively raining down great offerings, coated with incense and clouds of flower garlands

source_sentence: 燒香衣服雲　　麼尼光明燈
translation: cloud of burning incense and clothing, a bright lamp of maṇi light

source_sentence: 幢幡寶帳雲　　種種天音樂
translation: banners, streamers, and clouds of jeweled canopies, various celestial sounds, and music

source_sentence: 普遍諸佛土　　真實成供養
translation: universal Buddha-lands, truly established as offerings

source_sentence: 獲無量福聚　　如虛空無邊
translation: attains an immeasurable stock of merit like space without limit

source_sentence: 常生諸佛會　　拔濟諸有情
translation: to always produce the assembly of the buddhas and rescue all sentient beings

source_sentence: 真言曰。
translation: The true teaching is.

source_sentence: 唵(引)阿謨(引)佉布惹麼抳鉢娜麼(二合)嚩日哩(二合)怛他蘖多尾路(引)枳帝三滿多鉢囉(二合)娑囉吽(引)　專注觀本尊　　分明如目前　慈悲忿怒相　　眷屬自圍遶　念念生仰慕　　現前獲三昧　虔誠金剛讚　　讚曰麼賀作訖囉(二合)野戰拏野尾儞也(二合)囉(引)惹野娑(引)馱吠(微閉反)訥難(平)多那麼(上)迦夜(引)野曩麼悉帝(引)嚩日羅(二合)跛拏曳　眾聖皆歡喜　　觀想本尊頂　上有金剛輪　　空中而旋轉　座下二金輪　　次金剛部母　次大輪金剛　　根本懺悔印　戒方進力內相叉　　檀慧忍願智相合　如輪三角光明焰　　禪智在頂乞歡喜　我今依法結護已　　皆有闕犯三昧耶　密持蘇摩金剛明　　懺悔四時諸過失　大輪金剛真言曰曩莫悉底哩也(四合)地尾(二合)迦(引)喃薩嚩怛他(引)蘖哆喃唵(引)尾囉爾(茲以反)尾囉爾摩賀(引)作訖囉(二合)嚩日哩(二合)娑哆娑哆娑(引)囉底(丁以反)娑囉底(準上)怛囉(二合)以怛羅(二合)以尾馱麼儞三(去)畔若儞怛囉(二合)摩(上)底悉馱(引)儗哩(二合)曳怛囕(二合)娑嚩(二合)賀(引)　次拍金剛掌　　令聖眾歡喜真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) amogha (citation) khaapjama (citation) pana-māsa (binary) vajra (binary) tantra tiller tuo tail lu (citation) khiti samantabharat (binary) sārā un (citation) concentrate on the Bhagavān as he clearly shows, compassionate and angry, surrounded by his followers, mindfully giving rise to admiration, presently attaining samādhi, devotion, and vajra praise, hymning praise to him as mahāsa (binary) khaapjama (citation) nandana (binary) rāja (citation) sahā (citation) dhvaja (citation) ano mahāsa (citation) siddhi (citation) vajra (citation) rāja (binary) rāja (binary) rāja (citation) All the sages are rejoicing.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)都使野斛
translation: "Om (citation) Vajra (dichotomy) Tuṣita (dibhāga).

source_sentence: 二手捧念珠　　至頂置於心
translation: holding a rosary in the hand to the top of the head and placing it in the heart

source_sentence: 真言曰。
translation: The true chant is.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)玉呬野(二合)惹跛三麼曳吽(引)持珠真言曰。
translation: "Om (citation) Vajra (dichotomy), Yohino (dichotomy), Jākamisama, and Hum (citation), holding the pearl, the true saying goes.

source_sentence: 唵(引)枳里枳里勃知里(二合)底娑嚩(二合)賀　觀妙菩提心　　圓明淨月輪　祕密暗字門　　紫磨金色光　行住及坐臥　　常令現其前　身心不動搖　　輕慢觀諸事　小聲自耳聞　　不緩亦不急　如念誦於時　　切緣出道場　當安諸聖眾　　偈曰　奉請來降三摩地　　不違本願滿世間　不空事業暫令安　　唯願聖眾歸圓寂當振金剛鈴。
translation: "Om (citation) khiri khiri pochiri (dichotomy) svāhva (dichotomy) he observes the mind of marvelous enlightenment, the perfectly clear and pure moon, the secret and dark letters, the golden light of violet polish, walking, standing, sitting, lying, and always causing it to appear in front of him, his body and mind not wavering, contemplating things with disdain, and hearing small sounds from his own ears, not being slow or hasty. When he recites this, he makes the site of the path relevant, and he will calm the noble multitude. The verse says, "I beg you to come down to the concentration of samādhi, not to fill the world with your original vows, not to make your undertakings temporarily tranquil, and may the noble multitude return to perfect tranquility.

source_sentence: 真言曰。
translation: The verse says.

source_sentence: 唵(引)嚩日囉(二合)健吒惡(入引)　安祥徐步出　　入稱吽字明　念畢欲發遺　　再結普供養　次陳部母明　　分付真言句　我今為一切　　至求菩提果　唯願大聖尊　　成就我遍數　常結部母印　　百字明加持　令本尊歡喜　　火院左旋轉　即成解大印誦偈曰。
translation: "Om (citation) vajra (binary) kaṇṭhaka (citation) peacefully steps out, enters, calls on the uncitizen, finishes his recitation, wishes to make offerings, then presents the mother of the order, distributes the true words, and now I'm doing it for all of them, seeking the fruit of enlightenment. May the great sage accomplish my omnipotence, always forming the mother of the order, bestowing the hundred-syllable mudrā, making the venerable happy, and then turning to the left in the fire court, he accomplishes the great seal of liberation, reciting the verse.

source_sentence: 現世諸如來　　救世諸菩薩
translation: "Tathāgatas in the present world, bodhisattvas in the salvation world.

source_sentence: 不斷大乘教　　到殊勝智地
translation: does not cut off the great vehicle teaching and attains the stage of superior cognition

source_sentence: 唯願聖天眾　　決定證知我
translation: may the holy celestials all know me with certainty

source_sentence: 各當隨所安　　後復垂哀赴
translation: Each should take care of his or her own situation and then extend his or her condolences.

source_sentence: 次誦發遣偈。
translation: Next, he recites the invocation verse.

source_sentence: 已作如是勝上利　　施與一切眾生竟　願諸聖者歸本土　　振鈴不違弘誓願　當陳車輅奉送印　次開發發願　　次三部護身　禮懺依常儀　　隨意任經行大輪金剛修行悉地成就及供養法時寬延二歲次己巳七月穀旦
translation: "Having done so, I offer this excellent benefit to all sentient beings, may the sages return to their homeland, ringing the bell and not violating the great vow. Next, I present the chariot, present the seal, make the vow, followed by the three parts of the protection body, worship and repentance according to the usual rituals, and follow the scriptures, practice the great wheel, practice the vajra, accomplish accomplishments, and make offerings.
